data.lyric:
[ti:We Don't Talk About Bruno (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Carolina Gaitán - La Gaita/Mauro Castillo/Adassa/Rhenzy Feliz/Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz/Encanto - Cast]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]We Don't Talk About Bruno (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version) - Carolina Gaitán - La Gaita/Mauro Castillo/Adassa/Rhenzy Feliz/Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz/Encanto - Cast
[00:00.40]Lyrics by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:00.80]Composed by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:01.20]Pepa：
[00:01.22]We don't talk about Bruno no no no
[00:05.93]We don't talk about Bruno but
[00:09.90]Pepa/Félix：
[00:10.46]It was my wedding day
[00:11.64]It was our wedding day
[00:12.91]We were getting ready
[00:14.07]And there wasn't a cloud in the sky
[00:17.06]No clouds allowed in the sky
[00:19.48]Bruno walks in with a mischievous grin
[00:23.07]Thunder
[00:23.69]
[00:24.45]You telling this story or am I
[00:26.85]I'm sorry mi vida go on
[00:28.15]
[00:28.72]Bruno says "It looks like rain"
[00:31.44]Why did he tell us
[00:32.65]
[00:33.25]In doing so he floods my brain
[00:35.97]Abuela get the umbrellas
[00:37.92]Married in a hurricane
[00:40.66]What a joyous day but anyway
[00:42.43]Pepa/Félix/Camilo/Dolores：
[00:43.18]We don't talk about Bruno no no no
[00:47.30]
[00:47.80]We don't talk about Bruno
[00:51.32]Hey
[00:51.46]Dolores/Camilo：
[00:52.23]Grew to live in fear of Bruno stuttering or stumbling
[00:54.28]I can always hear him sort of muttering and mumbling
[00:56.49]I associate him with the sound of falling sand
[00:59.53]Ch ch ch
[01:01.29]It's a heavy lift with a gift so humbling
[01:03.62]Always left Abuela and the family fumbling
[01:05.86]Grappling with prophecies they couldn't understand
[01:09.00]Do you understand
[01:10.55]A seven-foot frame rats along his back
[01:14.81]When he calls your name it all fades to black
[01:19.32]Yeah he sees your dreams and feasts on your screams
[01:23.46]Hey
[01:23.88]Pepa/Félix/Dolores：
[01:24.32]
[01:25.02]We don't talk about Bruno no no no
[01:29.72]We don't talk about Bruno
[01:33.59]
[01:34.27]He told me my fish would die
[01:36.23]The next day dead
[01:37.57]No no
[01:38.80]He told me I'd grow a gut
[01:40.60]And just like he said
[01:42.32]No no
[01:42.62]He said that all my hair would disappear
[01:45.44]Now look at my head
[01:46.99]No no
[01:48.01]Your fate is sealed when your prophecy is read
[01:51.30]Isabela/Abuela/Dolores：
[01:51.88]
[01:52.61]He told me that the life of my dreams
[01:56.53]Would be promised and someday be mine
[01:59.96]
[02:01.81]He told me that my power would grow
[02:05.77]Like the grapes that thrive on the vine
[02:09.29]Óye Mariano's on his way
[02:11.17]He told me that the man of my dreams
[02:14.86]Would be just out of reach betrothed to another
[02:20.80]It's like I hear him now
[02:22.18]Hey sis
[02:22.90]
[02:24.72]I want not a sound out of you
[02:28.50]I can hear him now
[02:29.18]Mirabel/Camilo/Abuela/Isabela：
[02:29.94]Um Bruno
[02:30.92]
[02:32.33]Yeah about that Bruno
[02:34.34]I really need to know about Bruno
[02:36.50]Gimme the truth and the whole truth Bruno
[02:38.67]Isabela your boyfriend's here
[02:41.97]Time for dinner
[02:42.86]Pepa Félix/Dolores/Camilo/Isabela：
[02:43.67]
[02:44.19]It was my wedding day
[02:46.13]
[02:46.67]We were getting ready and there wasn't a cloud in the sky
[02:51.13]
[02:53.47]Bruno walks in with a mischievous grin
[02:57.08]
[02:58.05]You telling this story or am I
[03:00.65]Óye Mariano's on his way
[03:02.53]Bruno says "It looks like rain"
[03:05.43]
[03:07.05]In doing so he floods my brain
[03:10.01]
[03:11.58]Married in a hurricane
[03:14.97]All：
[03:15.22]
[03:16.35]He's here
[03:16.99]Don't talk about Bruno no
[03:19.09]Why did I talk about Bruno
[03:21.62]Not a word about Bruno
[03:23.40]I never shoulda brought up Bruno
data.trans:
[ti:We Don't Talk About Bruno (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Carolina Gaitán - La Gaita/Mauro Castillo/Adassa/Rhenzy Feliz/Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz/Encanto - Cast]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.40]//
[00:00.80]//
[00:01.20]//
[00:01.22]我们从不提布鲁诺
[00:05.93]我们从不提布鲁诺 但是
[00:09.90]//
[00:10.46]那一天是我的大婚之日
[00:11.64]那天我们正在举办婚礼
[00:12.91]我们做好准备
[00:14.07]天空万里无云
[00:17.06]不允许一朵乌云的存在
[00:19.48]布鲁诺走进来 咧着嘴笑
[00:23.07]雷声轰鸣
[00:23.69]
[00:24.45]是你在讲故事抑或是我在讲
[00:26.85]抱歉亲爱的 请继续
[00:28.15]
[00:28.72]布鲁诺说 "仿佛要下雨了"
[00:31.44]为何他要告诉我们
[00:32.65]
[00:33.25]他这样做会扰乱了我的思绪
[00:35.97]奶奶撑起了伞
[00:37.92]在飓风中成婚
[00:40.66]是多么欢乐的一天 但是不管怎样
[00:42.43]//
[00:43.18]我们从不提布鲁诺
[00:47.30]
[00:47.80]我们从不提布鲁诺
[00:51.32]//
[00:51.46]//
[00:52.23]从小就活在恐惧中 害怕布鲁诺说话会口齿不清
[00:54.28]我总是能听见他在喃喃自语
[00:56.49]我会把他的声音和沙漏声联系在一起
[00:59.53]//
[01:01.29]这是个沉重的天赋 让人如此卑微
[01:03.62]总是让奶奶和家人们摸不着头脑
[01:05.86]为他们无法理解的预言感到纠结
[01:09.00]你明白吗
[01:10.55]看起来有七英尺高 老鼠跟在他的身后
[01:14.81]当他呼唤你的名字 黑暗便会袭来
[01:19.32]没错 他能够窥见你的梦 享受着你的尖叫声
[01:23.46]//
[01:23.88]//
[01:24.32]
[01:25.02]我们从不提布鲁诺
[01:29.72]我们从不提布鲁诺
[01:33.59]
[01:34.27]他告诉我 我的鱼会死 
[01:36.23]第二天果然死了
[01:37.57]//
[01:38.80]他告诉我 我会变得大腹便便 
[01:40.60]果不其然
[01:42.32]//
[01:42.62]他说我的头发将会消失 
[01:45.44]现在瞧瞧我的头发
[01:46.99]//
[01:48.01]当他公布预言 你的命运已被谱写
[01:51.30]//
[01:51.88]
[01:52.61]他告诉我梦想中的生活
[01:56.53]在将来的某天会实现的
[01:59.96]
[02:01.81]他告诉我 我的力量将会增长
[02:05.77]像在藤蔓上茁壮成长的葡萄一样
[02:09.29]马里亚诺正在来的路上
[02:11.17]他告诉我 我的梦中情人
[02:14.86]是遥不可及的 他会和别的人订婚
[02:20.80]仿佛我现在才听进去他的话
[02:22.18]嘿 姐妹
[02:22.90]
[02:24.72]我不想听你说话
[02:28.50]现在我才把他的话听进去
[02:29.18]//
[02:29.94]布鲁诺
[02:30.92]
[02:32.33]关于布鲁诺
[02:34.34]我真的需要了解布鲁诺的事情
[02:36.50]布鲁诺 告诉我全部真相
[02:38.67]伊莎贝拉 你的男友到了
[02:41.97]晚宴时间到了
[02:42.86]//
[02:43.67]
[02:44.19]那一天是我的大婚之日
[02:46.13]
[02:46.67]我们做好准备 天空万里无云
[02:51.13]
[02:53.47]布鲁诺走进来 咧着嘴笑
[02:57.08]
[02:58.05]是你在讲故事抑或是我在讲
[03:00.65]马里亚诺正在来的路上
[03:02.53]布鲁诺说 "仿佛要下雨了"
[03:05.43]
[03:07.05]他这样做会扰乱了我的思绪
[03:10.01]
[03:11.58]在飓风中成婚
[03:14.97]//
[03:15.22]
[03:16.35]他来了
[03:16.99]不要提布鲁诺
[03:19.09]为何我要提布鲁诺
[03:21.62]关于布鲁诺的一个字也别说
[03:23.40]我就不应该提起布鲁诺
